name: Harbinger - Partial Demo
description: Hello, fellows! Welcome to Harbinger where you play as Edith, a young mage obsessed with the destruction of humanity! A retro 2-D platformer with a twist. Brought to you by Gygis Games: Development -Zach Puckett and Kyle Walters, Music - Luke Braden, Art - Cory Connor.  Additional Music and Art courtesy of OpenGameArt.
